title: Can you identify this font?
content:
I've tried to use the online tools to help me identify the font in this image, but no luck yet. Can anyone help me identify it?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150426172244im_/http:/typophile.com/files/12_4804.jpg)
author: bigpic

comments.content:
|2| is from Pompadour ( [http://www.losttype.com/font/?name=pompadour](http://web.archive.org/web/20150426172244/http:/www.losttype.com/font/?name=pompadour "http://www.losttype.com/font/?name=pompadour")).  
|1| seems to have been somewhat slimmed.
Thanks, riccard0. Pompadour is definitely used here, and the 1 has been modified. Thanks for your help!
